## Overview

Convert this issue to an **Epic** if there are multiple `Scenarios`.
Each `Scenario` should be it's own issue that belongs to this **Epic**.

{{ long description }}

```gherkin
Feature: {{feature}}
  As a {{persona}}
  I want {{need}}
  So that {{rationale}}

  Scenario: {{scenario}}
    Given {{thing}}
    When {{action}}
    Then {{result}}
```
